description: If true, puts whether this <%=class_name%> has the effects of `AirShoe`.
Otherwise, removes the effect of `AirShoe` if the <%=class_name%> has it.
While under the effects of `AirShoe`, the <%=class_name%> is able to move over `Broken` <%=tile%>s.

parameters.name: has_effect
parameters.desc: `true` if you want this <%=class_name%> to have the `AirShoe` effect. Otherwise `false`.
